en: Oh give thanks unto Jehovah; for he is good; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: Aw, LALPA kuoma lâwmthu hril ro, ama chu a ṭha sih a, A ngilneina khawm kumkhawtluongin a um ding a ni sih a;

en: Let Israel now say, That his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: A ngilneina chu kumkhawtluongin a um ding a nih ti, Israelhai chun hril raw hai se.

en: Let the house of Aaron now say, That his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: A ngilneina chu kumkhawtluongin a um ding a nih ti, Aron sûnghai chun hril raw hai se.

en: Let them now that fear Jehovah say, That his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a nih ti, LALPA ṭituhai chun hril raw hai se.

en: Out of my distress I called upon Jehovah: Jehovah answered me and set me in a large place.
hmr: Ka lunginzîngnaa inthawkin, LALPA chu ka ko a, LALPA chun a mi dawn a, hmun inthâwl takah a mîn umtir tah a.

en: Jehovah is on my side; I will not fear: What can man do unto me?
hmr: LALPA chu keia tienga ṭhang a nih, ṭi naw ning: Mihriemin ieng am mi law thei an ta?

en: Jehovah is on my side among them that help me: Therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me.
hmr: LALPA chu keia tienga ṭhang, a mi ṭhangpuituhai laia mi a nih, Chuleiin, a mi theidatuhai chunga ka duthusâm chu hmûng ka tih.

en: It is better to take refuge in Jehovah Than to put confidence in man.
hmr: Mihriem ring nêk chun LALPAA ringna innghat hi a ṭha lem a nih.

en: It is better to take refuge in Jehovah Than to put confidence in princes.
hmr: Lalhai ring nêk chun, LALPAA ringna innghat hi a ṭha lem a nih.

en: All nations compassed me about: In the name of Jehovah I will cut them off.
hmr: Hnam tinrêngin an mîn huol vêl a, Anni chu LALPA hmingin sukbohmang ka tih.

en: They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: In the name of Jehovah I will cut them off.
hmr: Anni chun an mîn huol vêl a, anih, an mîn huolvêl a, Anni chu LALPA hmingin sukbohmang ka tih.

en: They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: In the name of Jehovah I will cut them off.
hmr: Khuoihai angin an mîn huol vêl a, hling chawk anga sukrêmin an um a, Anni chu LALPA hmingin sukbohmang ka tih.

en: Thou didst thrust sore at me that I might fall; But Jehovah helped me.
hmr: Ka tlûkna dingin natakin i mi sun ngei a, Nisienlakhawm, LALPA chun a mi ṭhangpui ta hlau a,

en: Jehovah is my strength and song; And he is become my salvation.
hmr: LALPA chu ka hrâtna le ka hla a nih, A mi sandamtu a lo ni ta bawk a:

en: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tents of the righteous: The right hand of Jehovah doeth valiantly.
hmr: Lâwmna le sandamna ri chu mi felhai puon inah a um hlak a, LALPA kut changtieng chun huoitakin a thaw hlak.

en: The right hand of Jehovah is exalted: The right hand of Jehovah doeth valiantly.
hmr: LALPA kut changtieng chu chawimawiin a um hlak a, LALPA kut changtieng chun huoitakin a thaw hlak.

en: I shall not die, but live, And declare the works of Jehovah.
hmr: Thi naw ning a, dam ka ta, LALPA thilthawhai chu inhriettir lem ka tih.

en: Jehovah hath chastened me sore; But he hath not given me over unto death.
hmr: LALPA chun nasatakin a mi thunun a, Thina kuoma ruok chun a mi pêk êm nawh.

en: Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will enter into them, I will give thanks unto Jehovah.
hmr: Felna kul kawtkhârhai hi mi hawngpêk unla, Hienga hin lût ka ta, LALPA kuomah lâwmthu hril ka tih.

en: This is the gate of Jehovah; The righteous shall enter into it.
hmr: Hi hi LALPA kawtkhâr a nih. Mi felhai chu lût an tih.

en: I will give thanks unto thee; for thou hast answered me, And art become my salvation.
hmr: I kuomah lâwmthu hril ka tih, nangin i mi dawnin, A mi sandamtu i lo ni ta sih a.

en: The stone which the builders rejected Is become the head of the corner.
hmr: In bâwltuhai lung dit naw kha, A kila lung ṭhangkaitak a lo ni tah.

en: This is Jehovah’s doing; It is marvellous in our eyes.
hmr: Chu chu LALPA thaw a na, Ei mithmuah a mak a nih.

en: This is the day which Jehovah hath made; We will rejoice and be glad in it.
hmr: Hi hi LALPA ni ruot chu a nih, Hi ni hin hlimin lâwm ei tiu.

en: Save now, we beseech thee, O Jehovah: O Jehovah, we beseech thee, send now prosperity.
hmr: Aw LALPA, kan ngên che, tuhin sandam la, Aw LALPA, kan ngên che, tuhin vângneina hung tir rawh.

en: Blessed be he that cometh in the name of Jehovah: We have blessed you out of the house of Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA hminga hung chu a hamṭha ie, LALPA ina inthawk hin mal kan sâwm cheu a ni hi.

en: Jehovah is God, and he hath given us light: Bind the sacrifice with cords, even unto the horns of the altar.
hmr: LALPA chu Pathien a nih, ama chun var a mi pêk a, Inthâwina ding chu hruihruolin thlung ro, mâichâm kihai ngeia chun.

en: Thou art my God, and I will give thanks unto thee: Thou art my God, I will exalt thee.
hmr: Nang chu ka Pathien i na, lâwmthu hril ka ti cheh a, Ka Pathien i na, chawimawi ka ti che.

en: Oh give thanks unto Jehovah; for he is good; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: Aw LALPA kuomah lâwmthu hril ro, ama chu a ṭha sih a: A ngilneina khawm kumkhawtluonga um ding a ni sih a.
